title: âš™ï¸ Set User Credentials
content:
git config user.name "judigot"
git config user.email "judigot@gmail.com"
git config --global user.name "judigot"
git config --global user.email "judigot@github.com"

title: âš ï¸ Upload & Replace Remote Repository Files
content:
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/judigot/<repositoryName>
git add .
git commit -m "Commit"
git remote -v
git push -f origin main
git status

title: ğŸ’¾ Upload & Save Changes
content:
git add .
git commit -m "Commit"
git push origin
git status
